```diff
+ // 2. åˆ†æindex.htmlä¸­çš„å†…è”ä»£ç 
+ function analyzeIndexHtml() {
+     console.log('\nğŸ“„ ç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šindex.htmlå†…è”ä»£ç åˆ†æ');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     const stats = {
+         totalLines: indexLines.length,
+         scriptLines: 0,
+         styleLines: 0,
+         htmlLines: 0,
+         functions: 0,
+         classes: 0,
+         globalVars: 0
+     };
+     
+     let inScript = false;
+     let inStyle = false;
+     
+     indexLines.forEach(line => {
+         const trimmed = line.trim();
+         
+         if (trimmed.includes('<script') && !trimmed.includes('src=')) {
+             inScript = true;
+         } else if (trimmed.includes('</script>')) {
+             inScript = false;
+         } else if (trimmed.includes('<style')) {
+             inStyle = true;
+         } else if (trimmed.includes('</style>')) {
+             inStyle = false;
+         }
+         
+         if (inScript) {
+             stats.scriptLines++;
+             
+             // ç»Ÿè®¡å‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰
+             if (trimmed.match(/^\s*function\s+\w+/)) {
+                 stats.functions++;
+             }
+             
+             // ç»Ÿè®¡ç±»å®šä¹‰
+             if (trimmed.match(/^\s*class\s+\w+/)) {
+                 stats.classes++;
+             }
+             
+             // ç»Ÿè®¡å…¨å±€å˜é‡ï¼ˆç®€å•æ£€æµ‹ï¼‰
+             if (trimmed.match(/^\s*(var|let|const)\s+\w+/) && !trimmed.includes('function')) {
+                 stats.globalVars++;
+             }
+         } else if (inStyle) {
+             stats.styleLines++;
+         } else {
+             stats.htmlLines++;
+         }
+     });
+     
+     console.log(`ğŸ“Š æ€»è¡Œæ•°: ${stats.totalLines}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ“œ JavaScriptè¡Œæ•°: ${stats.scriptLines} (${(stats.scriptLines/stats.totalLines*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ¨ CSSè¡Œæ•°: ${stats.styleLines} (${(stats.styleLines/stats.totalLines*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ·ï¸ HTMLè¡Œæ•°: ${stats.htmlLines} (${(stats.htmlLines/stats.totalLines*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`âš¡ å†…è”å‡½æ•°æ•°: ${stats.functions}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ—ï¸ å†…è”ç±»æ•°: ${stats.classes}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸŒ å…¨å±€å˜é‡æ•°: ${stats.globalVars}`);
+     
+     return stats;
+ }

+         // æ£€æŸ¥3rd_reconstructionç›®å½•
+         const refactorFiles = fs.readdirSync('3rd_reconstruction/src');
+         console.log('ğŸ“‚ ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡é‡æ„æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„:');
+         
+         function scanRefactorDir(dir, prefix = '') {
+             const items = fs.readdirSync(dir);
+             items.forEach(item => {
+                 const fullPath = `${dir}/${item}`;
+                 const stat = fs.statSync(fullPath);
+                 if (stat.isDirectory()) {
+                     console.log(`${prefix}ğŸ“ ${item}/`);
+                     scanRefactorDir(fullPath, prefix + '  ');
+                 } else {
+                     console.log(`${prefix}ğŸ“„ ${item}`);
+                     
+                     // æ£€æŸ¥æ ¸å¿ƒæ¶æ„ç»„ä»¶
+                     if (item.includes('universal_data_service')) refactorStats.universalDataService = true;
+                     if (item.includes('smart_md_parser')) refactorStats.smartMDParser = true;
+                     if (item.includes('ui_integration_adapter')) refactorStats.uiIntegrationAdapter = true;
+                     if (item.includes('tag_service_adapter')) refactorStats.tagServiceAdapter = true;
+                     if (item.includes('feature_switch_controller')) refactorStats.featureSwitchController = true;
+                 }
+             });
+         }
+         
+         scanRefactorDir('3rd_reconstruction/src');
+         
+         console.log('\nğŸ—ï¸ æ ¸å¿ƒæ¶æ„ç»„ä»¶çŠ¶æ€:');
+         console.log(`   ${refactorStats.universalDataService ? 'âœ…' : 'âŒ'} UniversalDataService (ä¸‡èƒ½æ•°æ®åº•åº§)`);
+         console.log(`   ${refactorStats.smartMDParser ? 'âœ…' : 'âŒ'} SmartMDParser (æ™ºèƒ½MDè§£æå™¨)`);
+         console.log(`   ${refactorStats.uiIntegrationAdapter ? 'âœ…' : 'âŒ'} UIIntegrationAdapter (UIé›†æˆé€‚é…å™¨)`);
+         console.log(`   ${refactorStats.tagServiceAdapter ? 'âœ…' : 'âŒ'} TagServiceAdapter (æ ‡ç­¾æœåŠ¡é€‚é…å™¨)`);
+         console.log(`   ${refactorStats.featureSwitchController ? 'âœ…' : 'âŒ'} FeatureSwitchController (åŠŸèƒ½å¼€å…³æ§åˆ¶å™¨)`);
+         
+     } catch (error) {
+         console.log('âŒ æ— æ³•åˆ†æç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡é‡æ„ç›®å½•:', error.message);
+     }
+     
+     return refactorStats;
+ }
+ 
+ // 4. æ¨¡å—åŒ–ç¨‹åº¦è¯„åˆ†
+ function calculateModularityScore(srcStats, indexStats, refactorStats) {
+     console.log('\nğŸ“Š ç¬¬å››éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šæ¨¡å—åŒ–ç¨‹åº¦è¯„åˆ†');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     let score = 0;
+     let maxScore = 100;
+     
+     // å¤–éƒ¨æ¨¡å—åŒ–ç¨‹åº¦ (40åˆ†)
+     const moduleScore = Math.min(40, srcStats.total * 5); // æ¯ä¸ªæ¨¡å—æ–‡ä»¶5åˆ†ï¼Œæœ€å¤š40åˆ†
+     score += moduleScore;
+     console.log(`ğŸ“¦ å¤–éƒ¨æ¨¡å—åŒ–: ${moduleScore}/40åˆ† (${srcStats.total}ä¸ªæ¨¡å—æ–‡ä»¶)`);
+     
+     // å†…è”ä»£ç æ¯”ä¾‹ (30åˆ†) - å†…è”ä»£ç è¶Šå°‘è¶Šå¥½
+     const inlineRatio = indexStats.scriptLines / indexStats.totalLines;
+     const inlineScore = Math.max(0, 30 - inlineRatio * 50); // å†…è”æ¯”ä¾‹è¶Šé«˜æ‰£åˆ†è¶Šå¤š
+     score += inlineScore;
+     console.log(`ğŸ“œ å†…è”ä»£ç æ§åˆ¶: ${inlineScore.toFixed(1)}/30åˆ† (å†…è”JSå æ¯”${(inlineRatio*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     
+     // ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡é‡æ„æ¶æ„ (20åˆ†)
+     const refactorComponents = Object.values(refactorStats).filter(Boolean).length;
+     const refactorScore = refactorComponents * 4; // æ¯ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒç»„ä»¶4åˆ†
+     score += refactorScore;
+     console.log(`ğŸ”„ ç¬¬ä¸‰æ¬¡é‡æ„æ¶æ„: ${refactorScore}/20åˆ† (${refactorComponents}/5ä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒç»„ä»¶)`);
+     
+     // ä»£ç ç»„ç»‡ç¨‹åº¦ (10åˆ†)
+     const orgScore = Math.min(10, (srcStats.services * 3 + srcStats.controllers * 2 + srcStats.ui * 2 + srcStats.utils * 1));
+     score += orgScore;
+     console.log(`ğŸ—ï¸ ä»£ç ç»„ç»‡ç¨‹åº¦: ${orgScore}/10åˆ†`);
+     
+     console.log(`\nğŸ¯ æ€»åˆ†: ${score.toFixed(1)}/${maxScore}åˆ†`);
+     
+     // è¯„çº§
+     let grade, recommendation;
+     if (score >= 80) {
+         grade = 'A (ä¼˜ç§€)';
+         recommendation = 'æ¨¡å—åŒ–ç¨‹åº¦å¾ˆé«˜ï¼Œç»§ç»­ä¿æŒ';
+     } else if (score >= 60) {
+         grade = 'B (è‰¯å¥½)';
+         recommendation = 'æ¨¡å—åŒ–ç¨‹åº¦è¾ƒå¥½ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è¿›ä¸€æ­¥ä¼˜åŒ–';
+     } else if (score >= 40) {
+         grade = 'C (ä¸€èˆ¬)';
+         recommendation = 'éœ€è¦åŠ å¼ºæ¨¡å—åŒ–ï¼Œå»ºè®®é‡æ„éƒ¨åˆ†ä»£ç ';
+     } else {
+         grade = 'D (è¾ƒå·®)';
+         recommendation = 'æ¨¡å—åŒ–ç¨‹åº¦è¾ƒä½ï¼Œå»ºè®®è¿›è¡Œå…¨é¢é‡æ„';
+     }
+     
+     console.log(`ğŸ“ˆ è¯„çº§: ${grade}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ’¡ å»ºè®®: ${recommendation}`);
+     
+     return { score, grade, recommendation };
+ }
+ 
+ // 5. æ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®
+ function generateImprovementSuggestions(srcStats, indexStats, refactorStats) {
+     console.log('\nğŸ’¡ ç¬¬äº”éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šæ¨¡å—åŒ–æ”¹è¿›å»ºè®®');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     const suggestions = [];
+     
+     // åŸºäºåˆ†æç»“æœç”Ÿæˆå»ºè®®
+     if (indexStats.scriptLines > indexStats.totalLines * 0.7) {
+         suggestions.push('ğŸ”„ å°†index.htmlä¸­çš„å¤§é‡å†…è”JavaScriptæå–åˆ°ç‹¬ç«‹æ¨¡å—æ–‡ä»¶');
+     }
+     
+     if (indexStats.functions > 50) {
+         suggestions.push('âš¡ å°†index.htmlä¸­çš„å‡½æ•°æŒ‰åŠŸèƒ½åˆ†ç»„ï¼Œç§»åŠ¨åˆ°ç›¸åº”çš„serviceæ¨¡å—');
+     }
+     
+     if (srcStats.services < 5) {
+         suggestions.push('ğŸ“¦ å¢åŠ æ›´å¤šserviceæ¨¡å—ï¼Œå®ç°å•ä¸€èŒè´£åŸåˆ™');
+     }
+     
+     if (!refactorStats.universalDataService) {
+         suggestions.push('ğŸ—ï¸ å®ç°UniversalDataServiceä¸‡èƒ½æ•°æ®åº•åº§');
+     }
+     
+     if (indexStats.styleLines > 100) {
+         suggestions.push('ğŸ¨ å°†å†…è”CSSæå–åˆ°å¤–éƒ¨æ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶');
+     }
+     
+     if (srcStats.controllers < 3) {
+         suggestions.push('ğŸ® å¢åŠ æ§åˆ¶å™¨æ¨¡å—ï¼Œåˆ†ç¦»ä¸šåŠ¡é€»è¾‘');
+     }
+     
+     suggestions.push('ğŸ”— å»ºç«‹æ¨¡å—é—´çš„æ ‡å‡†åŒ–æ¥å£å’Œä¾èµ–ç®¡ç†');
+     suggestions.push('ğŸ“ ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªæ¨¡å—æ·»åŠ è¯¦ç»†çš„JSDocæ–‡æ¡£');
+     suggestions.push('ğŸ§ª ä¸ºæ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡å—æ·»åŠ å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•');
+     
+     suggestions.forEach((suggestion, index) => {
+         console.log(`${index + 1}. ${suggestion}`);
+     });
+     
+     return suggestions;
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰§è¡Œè¯„ä¼°
+ const srcStats = analyzeSrcStructure();
+ const indexStats = analyzeIndexHtml();
+ const refactorStats = analyzeThirdRefactor();
+ const evaluation = calculateModularityScore(srcStats, indexStats, refactorStats);
+ const suggestions = generateImprovementSuggestions(srcStats, indexStats, refactorStats);
+ 
+ // ç”ŸæˆæŠ¥å‘Šæ–‡ä»¶
+ const report = {
+     timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
+     srcStructure: srcStats,
+     indexAnalysis: indexStats,
+     refactorArchitecture: refactorStats,
+     evaluation,
+     suggestions
+ };
+ 
+ fs.writeFileSync('modularity-evaluation-report.json', JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
+ 
+ console.log('\nğŸ“„ è¯¦ç»†è¯„ä¼°æŠ¥å‘Šå·²ä¿å­˜åˆ°: modularity-evaluation-report.json');
+ console.log('\n=====================================');
+ console.log('ğŸ¯ NodeMindæ¨¡å—åŒ–è¯„ä¼°å®Œæˆï¼');
```

```javascript
- é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†ç»Ÿä¸€
```

```diff
+ import fs from 'fs';

+ console.log('ğŸ“Š å†…è”åˆ†ç¦»ç˜¦èº«æ•ˆæœåˆ†æ');
+ console.log('=====================================\n');

+ // è¯»å–index.html
+ const indexContent = fs.readFileSync('index.html', 'utf8');
+ const indexLines = indexContent.split('\n');

+ // åˆ†æå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€
+ function analyzeCurrentState() {
+     console.log('ğŸ“‹ ç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šå½“å‰çŠ¶æ€åˆ†æ');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     const stats = {
+         totalLines: indexLines.length,
+         totalSize: indexContent.length,
+         scriptLines: 0,
+         styleLines: 0,
+         htmlLines: 0,
+         functions: [],
+         classes: [],
+         globalVars: [],
+         largeBlocks: []
+     };
+     
+     let inScript = false;
+     let inStyle = false;
+     let currentBlock = [];
+     let blockType = '';
+     let blockStart = 0;
+     
+     indexLines.forEach((line, index) => {
+         const trimmed = line.trim();
+         
+         if (trimmed.includes('<script') && !trimmed.includes('src=')) {
+             inScript = true;
+             blockType = 'script';
+             blockStart = index;
+             currentBlock = [];
+         } else if (trimmed.includes('</script>')) {
+             inScript = false;
+             if (currentBlock.length > 50) {
+                 stats.largeBlocks.push({
+                     type: 'script',
+                     start: blockStart,
+                     end: index,
+                     lines: currentBlock.length,
+                     size: currentBlock.join('\n').length
+                 });
+             }
+         } else if (trimmed.includes('<style')) {
+             inStyle = true;
+             blockType = 'style';
+             blockStart = index;
+             currentBlock = [];
+         } else if (trimmed.includes('</style>')) {
+             inStyle = false;
+             if (currentBlock.length > 10) {
+                 stats.largeBlocks.push({
+                     type: 'style',
+                     start: blockStart,
+                     end: index,
+                     lines: currentBlock.length,
+                     size: currentBlock.join('\n').length
+                 });
+             }
+         }
+         
+         if (inScript) {
+             stats.scriptLines++;
+             currentBlock.push(line);
+             
+             // æ£€æµ‹å‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰
+             const funcMatch = trimmed.match(/^\s*function\s+(\w+)/);
+             if (funcMatch) {
+                 stats.functions.push({
+                     name: funcMatch[1],
+                     line: index + 1,
+                     size: 0 // å°†åœ¨åç»­è®¡ç®—
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             // æ£€æµ‹ç±»å®šä¹‰
+             const classMatch = trimmed.match(/^\s*class\s+(\w+)/);
+             if (classMatch) {
+                 stats.classes.push({
+                     name: classMatch[1],
+                     line: index + 1
+                 });
+             }
+             
+             // æ£€æµ‹å…¨å±€å˜é‡
+             const varMatch = trimmed.match(/^\s*(var|let|const)\s+(\w+)/);
+             if (varMatch && !trimmed.includes('function')) {
+                 stats.globalVars.push({
+                     name: varMatch[2],
+                     type: varMatch[1],
+                     line: index + 1
+                 });
+             }
+         } else if (inStyle) {
+             stats.styleLines++;
+             currentBlock.push(line);
+         } else {
+             stats.htmlLines++;
+         }
+     });
+     
+     console.log(`ğŸ“Š æ–‡ä»¶æ€»å¤§å°: ${(stats.totalSize / 1024).toFixed(1)} KB`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ“ æ€»è¡Œæ•°: ${stats.totalLines}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ“œ JavaScriptè¡Œæ•°: ${stats.scriptLines} (${(stats.scriptLines/stats.totalLines*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ¨ CSSè¡Œæ•°: ${stats.styleLines} (${(stats.styleLines/stats.totalLines*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ·ï¸ HTMLè¡Œæ•°: ${stats.htmlLines} (${(stats.htmlLines/stats.totalLines*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`âš¡ å‡½æ•°æ•°é‡: ${stats.functions.length}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ—ï¸ ç±»æ•°é‡: ${stats.classes.length}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸŒ å…¨å±€å˜é‡æ•°: ${stats.globalVars.length}`);
+     console.log(`ğŸ“¦ å¤§å‹ä»£ç å—: ${stats.largeBlocks.length}`);
+     
+     return stats;
+ }

+ // åˆ†æå¯åˆ†ç¦»çš„å†…å®¹
+ function analyzeSeparableContent(stats) {
+     console.log('\nğŸ” ç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šå¯åˆ†ç¦»å†…å®¹åˆ†æ');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     const separable = {
+         functions: {
+             count: stats.functions.length,
+             estimatedLines: stats.functions.length * 15, // å¹³å‡æ¯ä¸ªå‡½æ•°15è¡Œ
+             categories: {
+                 mindmapCore: Math.floor(stats.functions.length * 0.25),
+                 nodeManagement: Math.floor(stats.functions.length * 0.20),
+                 uiInteraction: Math.floor(stats.functions.length * 0.18),
+                 dataProcessing: Math.floor(stats.functions.length * 0.15),
+                 utilities: Math.floor(stats.functions.length * 0.12),
+                 eventHandling: Math.floor(stats.functions.length * 0.10)
+             }
+         },
+         globalVars: {
+             count: stats.globalVars.length,
+             estimatedLines: stats.globalVars.length * 2, // å¹³å‡æ¯ä¸ªå˜é‡2è¡Œ
+             canCentralize: Math.floor(stats.globalVars.length * 0.8) // 80%å¯ä»¥é›†ä¸­ç®¡ç†
+         },
+         largeBlocks: stats.largeBlocks,
+         totalSeparableLines: 0,
+         totalSeparableSize: 0
+     };
+     
+     // è®¡ç®—å¯åˆ†ç¦»çš„æ€»è¡Œæ•°
+     separable.totalSeparableLines = separable.functions.estimatedLines + 
+                                    separable.globalVars.estimatedLines;
+     
+     // è®¡ç®—å¤§å‹ä»£ç å—
+     stats.largeBlocks.forEach(block => {
+         separable.totalSeparableLines += block.lines;
+         separable.totalSeparableSize += block.size;
+     });
+     
+     console.log('ğŸ“¦ å‡½æ•°åˆ†ç¦»æ½œåŠ›:');
+     console.log(`   - æ€»å‡½æ•°æ•°: ${separable.functions.count}`);
+     console.log(`   - é¢„ä¼°æ€»è¡Œæ•°: ${separable.functions.estimatedLines}`);
+     console.log('   - åˆ†ç±»å»ºè®®:');
+     Object.entries(separable.functions.categories).forEach(([category, count]) => {
+         const categoryNames = {
+             mindmapCore: 'è„‘å›¾æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½',
+             nodeManagement: 'èŠ‚ç‚¹ç®¡ç†åŠŸèƒ½', 
+             uiInteraction: 'UIäº¤äº’åŠŸèƒ½',
+             dataProcessing: 'æ•°æ®å¤„ç†åŠŸèƒ½',
+             utilities: 'å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°',
+             eventHandling: 'äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†'
+         };
+         console.log(`     * ${categoryNames[category]}: ${count}ä¸ªå‡½æ•°`);
+     });
+     
+     console.log('\nğŸŒ å…¨å±€å˜é‡æ•´åˆ:');
+     console.log(`   - æ€»å˜é‡æ•°: ${separable.globalVars.count}`);
+     console.log(`   - å¯é›†ä¸­ç®¡ç†: ${separable.globalVars.canCentralize}ä¸ª (${(separable.globalVars.canCentralize/separable.globalVars.count*100).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     
+     console.log('\nğŸ“¦ å¤§å‹ä»£ç å—:');
+     stats.largeBlocks.forEach((block, index) => {
+         console.log(`   ${index + 1}. ${block.type.toUpperCase()}å—: ${block.lines}è¡Œ (${(block.size/1024).toFixed(1)}KB)`);
+     });
+     
+     return separable;
+ }

+ // è®¡ç®—ç˜¦èº«æ•ˆæœ
+ function calculateSlimmingEffect(stats, separable) {
+     console.log('\nğŸ“‰ ç¬¬ä¸‰éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šç˜¦èº«æ•ˆæœé¢„æµ‹');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     const effect = {
+         before: {
+             lines: stats.totalLines,
+             size: stats.totalSize,
+             jsRatio: (stats.scriptLines / stats.totalLines * 100).toFixed(1)
+         },
+         separatedContent: {
+             lines: separable.totalSeparableLines,
+             size: separable.totalSeparableSize,
+             percentage: (separable.totalSeparableLines / stats.totalLines * 100).toFixed(1)
+         },
+         after: {
+             lines: 0,
+             size: 0,
+             jsRatio: 0
+         },
+         newFiles: []
+     };
+     
+     // è®¡ç®—åˆ†ç¦»åçš„æ•ˆæœ
+     effect.after.lines = stats.totalLines - separable.totalSeparableLines;
+     effect.after.size = stats.totalSize - separable.totalSeparableSize;
+     effect.after.jsRatio = ((stats.scriptLines - separable.totalSeparableLines) / effect.after.lines * 100).toFixed(1);
+     
+     // é¢„æµ‹æ–°æ–‡ä»¶ç»“æ„
+     effect.newFiles = [
+         { name: 'src/core/app_core.js', lines: 200, desc: 'åº”ç”¨æ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘' },
+         { name: 'src/services/mindmap_core_service.js', lines: separable.functions.categories.mindmapCore * 15, desc: 'è„‘å›¾æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½' },
+         { name: 'src/services/node_management_service.js', lines: separable.functions.categories.nodeManagement * 15, desc: 'èŠ‚ç‚¹ç®¡ç†' },
+         { name: 'src/services/ui_interaction_service.js', lines: separable.functions.categories.uiInteraction * 15, desc: 'UIäº¤äº’' },
+         { name: 'src/services/data_processing_service.js', lines: separable.functions.categories.dataProcessing * 15, desc: 'æ•°æ®å¤„ç†' },
+         { name: 'src/core/global_state.js', lines: separable.globalVars.canCentralize * 2, desc: 'å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†' },
+         { name: 'src/utils/utility_functions.js', lines: separable.functions.categories.utilities * 15, desc: 'å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°' }
+     ];
+     
+     console.log('ğŸ“Š ç˜¦èº«å‰åå¯¹æ¯”:');
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“ æ€»è¡Œæ•°: ${effect.before.lines} â†’ ${effect.after.lines} (å‡å°‘${effect.before.lines - effect.after.lines}è¡Œ)`);
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“¦ æ–‡ä»¶å¤§å°: ${(effect.before.size/1024).toFixed(1)}KB â†’ ${(effect.after.size/1024).toFixed(1)}KB (å‡å°‘${((effect.before.size - effect.after.size)/1024).toFixed(1)}KB)`);
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“œ JSå æ¯”: ${effect.before.jsRatio}% â†’ ${effect.after.jsRatio}% (å‡å°‘${(effect.before.jsRatio - effect.after.jsRatio).toFixed(1)}%)`);
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“‰ ç˜¦èº«å¹…åº¦: ${effect.separatedContent.percentage}%`);
+     
+     console.log('\nğŸ“ æ–°å¢æ¨¡å—æ–‡ä»¶é¢„æµ‹:');
+     let totalNewLines = 0;
+     effect.newFiles.forEach((file, index) => {
+         console.log(`   ${index + 1}. ${file.name}`);
+         console.log(`      - é¢„ä¼°è¡Œæ•°: ${file.lines}`);
+         console.log(`      - åŠŸèƒ½æè¿°: ${file.desc}`);
+         totalNewLines += file.lines;
+     });
+     
+     console.log(`\nğŸ“ˆ æ¨¡å—åŒ–æ”¶ç›Š:`);
+     console.log(`   - index.htmlç˜¦èº«: ${effect.separatedContent.percentage}%`);
+     console.log(`   - æ–°å¢æ¨¡å—æ–‡ä»¶: ${effect.newFiles.length}ä¸ª`);
+     console.log(`   - ä»£ç æ€»é‡å˜åŒ–: ${stats.totalLines} â†’ ${effect.after.lines + totalNewLines} (${totalNewLines > 0 ? '+' : ''}${totalNewLines - (stats.totalLines - effect.after.lines)}è¡Œ)`);
+     
+     return effect;
+ }

+ // ç”Ÿæˆå®æ–½æ–¹æ¡ˆ
+ function generateImplementationPlan(stats, separable, effect) {
+     console.log('\nğŸš€ ç¬¬å››éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šå®æ–½æ–¹æ¡ˆ');
+     console.log('----------------------------------');
+     
+     const phases = [
+         {
+             name: 'ç¬¬ä¸€é˜¶æ®µï¼šæ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘åˆ†ç¦»',
+             priority: 'é«˜',
+             risk: 'ä½',
+             duration: '1-2å¤©',
+             tasks: [
+                 'åˆ›å»º src/core/app_core.js',
+                 'åˆ†ç¦»åº”ç”¨åˆå§‹åŒ–é€»è¾‘',
+                 'åˆ†ç¦»å…¨å±€äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†',
+                 'æµ‹è¯•æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½å®Œæ•´æ€§'
+             ],
+             expectedReduction: '500-800è¡Œ'
+         },
+         {
+             name: 'ç¬¬äºŒé˜¶æ®µï¼šåŠŸèƒ½æ¨¡å—åˆ†ç¦»',
+             priority: 'é«˜',
+             risk: 'ä¸­',
+             duration: '3-5å¤©',
+             tasks: [
+                 'æŒ‰åŠŸèƒ½åŸŸåˆ†ç¦»157ä¸ªå‡½æ•°',
+                 'åˆ›å»º6ä¸ªä¸»è¦æœåŠ¡æ¨¡å—',
+                 'å»ºç«‹æ¨¡å—é—´æ¥å£',
+                 'é€æ­¥æµ‹è¯•æ¯ä¸ªæ¨¡å—'
+             ],
+             expectedReduction: '2000-3000è¡Œ'
+         },
+         {
+             name: 'ç¬¬ä¸‰é˜¶æ®µï¼šçŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ä¼˜åŒ–',
+             priority: 'ä¸­',
+             risk: 'ä¸­',
+             duration: '2-3å¤©',
+             tasks: [
+                 'åˆ›å»ºå…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†å™¨',
+                 'æ•´åˆ642ä¸ªå…¨å±€å˜é‡',
+                 'å®ç°çŠ¶æ€è®¿é—®å™¨',
+                 'ä¼˜åŒ–æ•°æ®æµ'
+             ],
+             expectedReduction: '1000-1500è¡Œ'
+         },
+         {
+             name: 'ç¬¬å››é˜¶æ®µï¼šä»£ç å—ä¼˜åŒ–',
+             priority: 'ä¸­',
+             risk: 'ä½',
+             duration: '1-2å¤©',
+             tasks: [
+                 'æå–å¤§å‹ä»£ç å—',
+                 'ä¼˜åŒ–é‡å¤ä»£ç ',
+                 'æ¸…ç†å†—ä½™é€»è¾‘',
+                 'æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–'
+             ],
+             expectedReduction: '500-1000è¡Œ'
+         }
+     ];
+     
+     console.log('ğŸ“‹ åˆ†é˜¶æ®µå®æ–½è®¡åˆ’:');
+     phases.forEach((phase, index) => {
+         console.log(`\n${index + 1}. ${phase.name}`);
+         console.log(`   â­ ä¼˜å…ˆçº§: ${phase.priority}`);
+         console.log(`   âš ï¸ é£é™©ç­‰çº§: ${phase.risk}`);
+         console.log(`   â±ï¸ é¢„ä¼°å·¥æœŸ: ${phase.duration}`);
+         console.log(`   ğŸ“‰ é¢„æœŸç˜¦èº«: ${phase.expectedReduction}`);
+         console.log(`   ğŸ“‹ ä¸»è¦ä»»åŠ¡:`);
+         phase.tasks.forEach(task => {
+             console.log(`      - ${task}`);
+         });
+     });
+     
+     const totalReduction = {
+         min: 4000,
+         max: 6300,
+         percentage: {
+             min: (4000 / stats.totalLines * 100).toFixed(1),
+             max: (6300 / stats.totalLines * 100).toFixed(1)
+         }
+     };
+     
+     console.log(`\nğŸ¯ æ€»ä½“ç˜¦èº«é¢„æœŸ:`);
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“‰ è¡Œæ•°å‡å°‘: ${totalReduction.min}-${totalReduction.max}è¡Œ`);
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“Š ç˜¦èº«å¹…åº¦: ${totalReduction.percentage.min}%-${totalReduction.percentage.max}%`);
+     console.log(`   ğŸ“ æœ€ç»ˆindex.html: ${stats.totalLines - totalReduction.max}-${stats.totalLines - totalReduction.min}è¡Œ`);
+     
+     return { phases, totalReduction };
+ }
+ 
+ // æ‰§è¡Œåˆ†æ
+ const stats = analyzeCurrentState();
+ const separable = analyzeSeparableContent(stats);
+ const effect = calculateSlimmingEffect(stats, separable);
+ const plan = generateImplementationPlan(stats, separable, effect);
+ 
+ // ç”ŸæˆæŠ¥å‘Š
+ const report = {
+     timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
+     currentState: stats,
+     separableContent: separable,
+     slimmingEffect: effect,
+     implementationPlan: plan,
+     summary: {
+         currentSize: `${(stats.totalSize / 1024).toFixed(1)}KB`,
+         currentLines: stats.totalLines,
+         expectedReduction: `${plan.totalReduction.percentage.min}%-${plan.totalReduction.percentage.max}%`,
+         newModules: effect.newFiles.length,
+         implementationTime: '7-12å¤©'
+     }
+ };
+ 
+ fs.writeFileSync('inline-separation-analysis.json', JSON.stringify(report, null, 2));
```

+ ```typescript

```diff
+     queryNodes(query = {}) {
+         const results = [];
+         
+         for (const [nodeId, nodeData] of this.nodeDatabase) {
+             if (this._matchQuery(nodeData, query)) {
+                 results.push(nodeData);
+             }
+         }
+         
+         return results;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ£€æŸ¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯å¦åŒ¹é…æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶
+      * @param {Object} nodeData - èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
+      * @param {Object} query - æŸ¥è¯¢æ¡ä»¶
+      * @returns {boolean}
+      * @private
+      */
+     _matchQuery(nodeData, query) {
+         for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(query)) {
+             if (key === 'tags') {
+                 // æ ‡ç­¾æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼šæ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«æŒ‡å®šæ ‡ç­¾
+                 if (!Array.isArray(value)) continue;
+                 const hasAllTags = value.every(tag => nodeData.tags?.includes(tag));
+                 if (!hasAllTags) return false;
+             } else if (key === 'content_contains') {
+                 // å†…å®¹æœç´¢
+                 if (!nodeData.content?.toLowerCase().includes(value.toLowerCase())) {
+                     return false;
+                 }
+             } else if (nodeData[key] !== value) {
+                 return false;
+             }
+         }
+         return true;
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== è„‘å›¾æ•°æ®æ“ä½œ ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–è„‘å›¾æ•°æ®

+      * @returns {Object|null} è„‘å›¾æ•°æ®
+      */

+         return this.mindmapData.get(mapId) || null;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°è„‘å›¾æ•°æ®
+      * @param {string} mapId - è„‘å›¾ID
+      * @param {Object} data - è„‘å›¾æ•°æ®
+      */
+     updateMindmapData(mapId, data) {
+         const currentData = this.mindmapData.get(mapId) || {};
+         const updatedData = {
+             ...currentData,

+                 modified: new Date().toISOString()

+         this._notify({
+             type: 'mindmap_updated',
+             target: mapId,
+             data: updatedData
+         });
+         
+         console.log(`ğŸ—ºï¸ [DataStore] è„‘å›¾æ•°æ®å·²æ›´æ–°: ${mapId}`);
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== ç»„ä»¶çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç† ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–ç»„ä»¶çŠ¶æ€
+      * @param {string} componentId - ç»„ä»¶ID
+      * @returns {Object|null} ç»„ä»¶çŠ¶æ€
+      */
+     getComponentState(componentId) {
+         return this.componentData.get(componentId) || null;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°ç»„ä»¶çŠ¶æ€
+      * @param {string} componentId - ç»„ä»¶ID
+      * @param {Object} state - çŠ¶æ€æ•°æ®
+      */
+     updateComponentState(componentId, state) {
+         const currentState = this.componentData.get(componentId) || {};
+         const newState = { ...currentState, ...state };
+         
+         this.componentData.set(componentId, newState);
+         
+         this._notify({
+             type: 'component_state_updated',
+             target: componentId,
+             data: newState
+         });
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== æ•°æ®éªŒè¯ ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * éªŒè¯èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
+      * @param {Object} nodeData - èŠ‚ç‚¹æ•°æ®
+      * @returns {boolean} éªŒè¯ç»“æœ
+      * @private
+      */
+     _validateNodeData(nodeData) {
+         // åŸºæœ¬å­—æ®µéªŒè¯
+         if (!nodeData || typeof nodeData !== 'object') {
+             return false;
+         }
+         
+         // IDéªŒè¯ï¼ˆå¦‚æœæä¾›ï¼‰
+         if (nodeData.id && typeof nodeData.id !== 'string') {
+             return false;
+         }
+         
+         // ä¸»é¢˜éªŒè¯
+         if (nodeData.topic && typeof nodeData.topic !== 'string') {
+             return false;
+         }
+         
+         // æ ‡ç­¾éªŒè¯
+         if (nodeData.tags && !Array.isArray(nodeData.tags)) {
+             return false;
+         }
+         
+         return true;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆå”¯ä¸€èŠ‚ç‚¹ID
+      * @returns {string} èŠ‚ç‚¹ID
+      * @private
+      */
+     _generateNodeId() {
+         return `node_${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== æ•°æ®åŒæ­¥å’ŒæŒä¹…åŒ– ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®ï¼ˆç”¨äºå¯¼å‡ºï¼‰
+      * @returns {Object} å®Œæ•´æ•°æ®
+      */
+     exportAllData() {
+         return {
+             mindmapData: Object.fromEntries(this.mindmapData),
+             nodeDatabase: Object.fromEntries(this.nodeDatabase),
+             sessionDatabase: Object.fromEntries(this.sessionDatabase),
+             componentData: Object.fromEntries(this.componentData),
+             metaData: Object.fromEntries(this.metaData),
+             exportTime: new Date().toISOString(),
+             version: '4.0.0'
+         };
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * å¯¼å…¥æ•°æ®
+      * @param {Object} data - è¦å¯¼å…¥çš„æ•°æ®
+      * @returns {boolean} å¯¼å…¥æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸ
+      */
+     importData(data) {
+         try {
+             // éªŒè¯æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼
+             if (!data || typeof data !== 'object') {
+                 throw new Error('æ— æ•ˆçš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼');
+             }
+             
+             // å¯¼å…¥å„ç±»æ•°æ®
+             if (data.mindmapData) {
+                 this.mindmapData = new Map(Object.entries(data.mindmapData));
+             }
+             if (data.nodeDatabase) {
+                 this.nodeDatabase = new Map(Object.entries(data.nodeDatabase));
+             }
+             if (data.sessionDatabase) {
+                 this.sessionDatabase = new Map(Object.entries(data.sessionDatabase));
+             }
+             if (data.componentData) {
+                 this.componentData = new Map(Object.entries(data.componentData));
+             }
+             if (data.metaData) {
+                 this.metaData = new Map(Object.entries(data.metaData));
+             }
+             
+             // é€šçŸ¥æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆ
+             this._notify({
+                 type: 'data_imported',
+                 target: 'all',
+                 data: { version: data.version, importTime: new Date().toISOString() }
+             });
+             
+             console.log('ğŸ“¥ [DataStore] æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å®Œæˆ');
+             return true;
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('ğŸš¨ [DataStore] æ•°æ®å¯¼å…¥å¤±è´¥:', error);
+             return false;
+         }
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ¸…ç©ºæ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
+      */
+     clearAllData() {
+         this.mindmapData.clear();
+         this.nodeDatabase.clear();
+         this.sessionDatabase.clear();
+         this.componentData.clear();
+         this.metaData.clear();
+         
+         // é‡æ–°åˆå§‹åŒ–é»˜è®¤æ•°æ®
+         this._initializeDefaultData();
+         
+         this._notify({
+             type: 'data_cleared',
+             target: 'all',
+             data: {}
+         });
+         
+         console.log('ğŸ§¹ [DataStore] æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®å·²æ¸…ç©º');
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–æ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @returns {Object} ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
+      */
+     getStats() {
+         return {
+             mindmapCount: this.mindmapData.size,
+             nodeCount: this.nodeDatabase.size,
+             sessionCount: this.sessionDatabase.size,
+             componentCount: this.componentData.size,
+             metaCount: this.metaData.size,
+             observerCount: this.observers.size,
+             isDirty: this.syncStatus.isDirty,
+             lastSync: this.syncStatus.lastSync
+         };
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºå…¨å±€å•ä¾‹å®ä¾‹
+ const dataStore = new UniversalDataStore();
+ 
+ // å¯¼å‡º
+ export default dataStore;
+ export { UniversalDataStore }; 
```

---

ç°åœ¨åˆ›å»ºç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡å— - äº‹ä»¶æ€»çº¿ç³»ç»Ÿï¼š

```diff
- 
+ /**
+  * NodeMind V4 - äº‹ä»¶æ€»çº¿ç³»ç»Ÿ (EventBus)
+  * 
+  * åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šæ¨¡å—é—´é€šä¿¡å’Œäº‹ä»¶ç®¡ç†
+  * ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ğŸ”¥ (æœ€é«˜)
+  * åŸºäºï¼šåŸä»£ç è¡Œå· 9001-10000
+  * 
+  * @author NodeMind Team
+  * @version 4.0.0
+  */
+ 
+ class UniversalEventBus {
+     constructor() {
+         // äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨å­˜å‚¨
+         this.listeners = new Map();
+         this.onceListeners = new Map();
+         
+         // äº‹ä»¶å†å²è®°å½•
+         this.eventHistory = [];
+         this.maxHistorySize = 1000;
+         
+         // äº‹ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
+         this.eventStats = new Map();
+         
+         // é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨
+         this.errorHandlers = new Set();
+         
+         // ä¸­é—´ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿ
+         this.middlewares = [];
+         
+         // äº‹ä»¶ä¼˜å…ˆçº§é˜Ÿåˆ—
+         this.priorityQueue = [];
+         this.isProcessing = false;
+         
+         // è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼
+         this.debugMode = false;
+         
+         console.log('ğŸšŒ [EventBus] äº‹ä»¶æ€»çº¿ç³»ç»Ÿå·²åˆå§‹åŒ–');
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== åŸºç¡€äº‹ä»¶ç®¡ç† ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * æ³¨å†Œäº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°
+      * @param {Function} callback - å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
+      * @param {Object} options - é€‰é¡¹
+      * @returns {Function} å–æ¶ˆç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
+      */
+     on(eventName, callback, options = {}) {
+         if (typeof eventName !== 'string' || typeof callback !== 'function') {
+             throw new Error('äº‹ä»¶åç§°å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œå›è°ƒå¿…é¡»æ˜¯å‡½æ•°');
+         }
+         
+         const listenerInfo = {
+             callback,
+             priority: options.priority || 0,
+             context: options.context || null,
+             filter: options.filter || null,
+             id: this._generateListenerId(),
+             createdAt: new Date().toISOString()
+         };
+         
+         // åˆå§‹åŒ–äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨æ•°ç»„
+         if (!this.listeners.has(eventName)) {
+             this.listeners.set(eventName, []);
+         }
+         
+         // æ·»åŠ ç›‘å¬å™¨å¹¶æŒ‰ä¼˜å…ˆçº§æ’åº
+         const listeners = this.listeners.get(eventName);
+         listeners.push(listenerInfo);
+         listeners.sort((a, b) => b.priority - a.priority);
+         
+         this._debugLog('on', `äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨å·²æ³¨å†Œ: ${eventName}`, { priority: options.priority });
+         
+         // è¿”å›å–æ¶ˆç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
+         return () => this.off(eventName, listenerInfo.id);
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ³¨å†Œä¸€æ¬¡æ€§äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°
+      * @param {Function} callback - å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°
+      * @param {Object} options - é€‰é¡¹
+      * @returns {Function} å–æ¶ˆç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
+      */
+     once(eventName, callback, options = {}) {
+         const onceCallback = (...args) => {
+             this.off(eventName, listenerId);
+             callback.apply(options.context || null, args);
+         };
+         
+         const unsubscribe = this.on(eventName, onceCallback, options);
+         const listenerId = this.listeners.get(eventName).find(l => l.callback === onceCallback)?.id;
+         
+         return unsubscribe;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°
+      * @param {string|Function} callbackOrId - å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°æˆ–ç›‘å¬å™¨ID
+      */
+     off(eventName, callbackOrId) {
+         if (!this.listeners.has(eventName)) {
+             return;
+         }
+         
+         const listeners = this.listeners.get(eventName);
+         const index = listeners.findIndex(listener => {
+             return listener.id === callbackOrId || listener.callback === callbackOrId;
+         });
+         
+         if (index !== -1) {
+             listeners.splice(index, 1);
+             this._debugLog('off', `äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨å·²ç§»é™¤: ${eventName}`);
+             
+             // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ç›‘å¬å™¨äº†ï¼Œåˆ é™¤äº‹ä»¶
+             if (listeners.length === 0) {
+                 this.listeners.delete(eventName);
+             }
+         }
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * è§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°
+      * @param {*} data - äº‹ä»¶æ•°æ®
+      * @param {Object} options - é€‰é¡¹
+      * @returns {Promise} äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
+      */
+     async emit(eventName, data = null, options = {}) {
+         const eventInfo = {
+             name: eventName,
+             data,
+             timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
+             id: this._generateEventId(),
+             source: options.source || 'unknown',
+             priority: options.priority || 0,
+             async: options.async !== false
+         };
+         
+         // è®°å½•äº‹ä»¶å†å²
+         this._recordEvent(eventInfo);
+         
+         // æ›´æ–°äº‹ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
+         this._updateEventStats(eventName);
+         
+         this._debugLog('emit', `äº‹ä»¶å·²è§¦å‘: ${eventName}`, eventInfo);
+         
+         // åº”ç”¨ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+         for (const middleware of this.middlewares) {
+             try {
+                 const result = await middleware(eventInfo);
+                 if (result === false) {
+                     this._debugLog('emit', `äº‹ä»¶è¢«ä¸­é—´ä»¶æ‹¦æˆª: ${eventName}`);
+                     return false;
+                 }
+             } catch (error) {
+                 this._handleError(error, eventInfo);
+             }
+         }
+         
+         // å¦‚æœæ˜¯é«˜ä¼˜å…ˆçº§äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œç«‹å³å¤„ç†
+         if (options.priority > 5) {
+             return this._processEvent(eventInfo);
+         }
+         
+         // å¦åˆ™åŠ å…¥é˜Ÿåˆ—
+         this.priorityQueue.push(eventInfo);
+         this.priorityQueue.sort((a, b) => b.priority - a.priority);
+         
+         // å¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†é˜Ÿåˆ—
+         if (!this.isProcessing) {
+             this._processQueue();
+         }
+         
+         return true;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * å¤„ç†äº‹ä»¶é˜Ÿåˆ—
+      * @private
+      */
+     async _processQueue() {
+         if (this.isProcessing || this.priorityQueue.length === 0) {
+             return;
+         }
+         
+         this.isProcessing = true;
+         
+         while (this.priorityQueue.length > 0) {
+             const eventInfo = this.priorityQueue.shift();
+             await this._processEvent(eventInfo);
+         }
+         
+         this.isProcessing = false;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªäº‹ä»¶
+      * @param {Object} eventInfo - äº‹ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @private
+      */
+     async _processEvent(eventInfo) {
+         const listeners = this.listeners.get(eventInfo.name) || [];
+         const results = [];
+         
+         for (const listener of listeners) {
+             try {
+                 // åº”ç”¨è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
+                 if (listener.filter && !listener.filter(eventInfo)) {
+                     continue;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // æ‰§è¡Œå›è°ƒ
+                 const context = listener.context || null;
+                 let result;
+                 
+                 if (eventInfo.async) {
+                     result = await listener.callback.call(context, eventInfo.data, eventInfo);
+                 } else {
+                     result = listener.callback.call(context, eventInfo.data, eventInfo);
+                 }
+                 
+                 results.push(result);
+                 
+             } catch (error) {
+                 this._handleError(error, eventInfo, listener);
+             }
+         }
+         
+         return results;
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== é«˜çº§åŠŸèƒ½ ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * æ·»åŠ ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+      * @param {Function} middleware - ä¸­é—´ä»¶å‡½æ•°
+      */
+     use(middleware) {
+         if (typeof middleware !== 'function') {
+             throw new Error('ä¸­é—´ä»¶å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å‡½æ•°');
+         }
+         
+         this.middlewares.push(middleware);
+         this._debugLog('use', 'ä¸­é—´ä»¶å·²æ·»åŠ ');
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç§»é™¤ä¸­é—´ä»¶
+      * @param {Function} middleware - ä¸­é—´ä»¶å‡½æ•°
+      */
+     unuse(middleware) {
+         const index = this.middlewares.indexOf(middleware);
+         if (index !== -1) {
+             this.middlewares.splice(index, 1);
+             this._debugLog('unuse', 'ä¸­é—´ä»¶å·²ç§»é™¤');
+         }
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ³¨å†Œé”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨
+      * @param {Function} handler - é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
+      */
+     onError(handler) {
+         if (typeof handler !== 'function') {
+             throw new Error('é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨å¿…é¡»æ˜¯å‡½æ•°');
+         }
+         
+         this.errorHandlers.add(handler);
+         return () => this.errorHandlers.delete(handler);
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç­‰å¾…ç‰¹å®šäº‹ä»¶
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°
+      * @param {Object} options - é€‰é¡¹
+      * @returns {Promise} äº‹ä»¶æ•°æ®
+      */
+     waitFor(eventName, options = {}) {
+         return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+             const timeout = options.timeout || 5000;
+             let timeoutId;
+             
+             const unsubscribe = this.once(eventName, (data) => {
+                 if (timeoutId) clearTimeout(timeoutId);
+                 resolve(data);
+             }, options);
+             
+             if (timeout > 0) {
+                 timeoutId = setTimeout(() => {
+                     unsubscribe();
+                     reject(new Error(`ç­‰å¾…äº‹ä»¶è¶…æ—¶: ${eventName}`));
+                 }, timeout);
+             }
+         });
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ‰¹é‡è§¦å‘äº‹ä»¶
+      * @param {Array} events - äº‹ä»¶æ•°ç»„
+      * @returns {Promise} å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
+      */
+     async emitBatch(events) {
+         const results = [];
+         
+         for (const event of events) {
+             const result = await this.emit(event.name, event.data, event.options);
+             results.push(result);
+         }
+         
+         return results;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * åˆ›å»ºå‘½åç©ºé—´
+      * @param {string} namespace - å‘½åç©ºé—´
+      * @returns {Object} å‘½åç©ºé—´äº‹ä»¶æ€»çº¿
+      */
+     namespace(namespace) {
+         return {
+             on: (eventName, callback, options) => {
+                 return this.on(`${namespace}:${eventName}`, callback, options);
+             },
+             once: (eventName, callback, options) => {
+                 return this.once(`${namespace}:${eventName}`, callback, options);
+             },
+             off: (eventName, callbackOrId) => {
+                 return this.off(`${namespace}:${eventName}`, callbackOrId);
+             },
+             emit: (eventName, data, options) => {
+                 return this.emit(`${namespace}:${eventName}`, data, {
+                     ...options,
+                     source: namespace
+                 });
+             }
+         };
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== äº‹ä»¶æŸ¥è¯¢å’Œç®¡ç† ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨åˆ—è¡¨
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
+      * @returns {Object} ç›‘å¬å™¨ä¿¡æ¯
+      */
+     getListeners(eventName = null) {
+         if (eventName) {
+             return this.listeners.get(eventName) || [];
+         }
+         
+         const allListeners = {};
+         for (const [name, listeners] of this.listeners) {
+             allListeners[name] = listeners.length;
+         }
+         return allListeners;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–äº‹ä»¶å†å²
+      * @param {Object} filter - è¿‡æ»¤æ¡ä»¶
+      * @returns {Array} äº‹ä»¶å†å²
+      */
+     getEventHistory(filter = {}) {
+         let history = [...this.eventHistory];
+         
+         if (filter.eventName) {
+             history = history.filter(event => event.name === filter.eventName);
+         }
+         
+         if (filter.since) {
+             const sinceDate = new Date(filter.since);
+             history = history.filter(event => new Date(event.timestamp) >= sinceDate);
+         }
+         
+         if (filter.source) {
+             history = history.filter(event => event.source === filter.source);
+         }
+         
+         return history.slice(-filter.limit || history.length);
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * è·å–äº‹ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
+      * @returns {Object} äº‹ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
+      */
+     getStats() {
+         return {
+             totalEvents: this.eventHistory.length,
+             activeListeners: this.listeners.size,
+             eventStats: Object.fromEntries(this.eventStats),
+             queueSize: this.priorityQueue.length,
+             isProcessing: this.isProcessing,
+             middlewareCount: this.middlewares.length,
+             errorHandlerCount: this.errorHandlers.size
+         };
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ¸…ç©ºäº‹ä»¶å†å²
+      */
+     clearHistory() {
+         this.eventHistory = [];
+         this.eventStats.clear();
+         this._debugLog('clearHistory', 'äº‹ä»¶å†å²å·²æ¸…ç©º');
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰ç›‘å¬å™¨
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰
+      */
+     removeAllListeners(eventName = null) {
+         if (eventName) {
+             this.listeners.delete(eventName);
+             this._debugLog('removeAllListeners', `å·²ç§»é™¤äº‹ä»¶çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç›‘å¬å™¨: ${eventName}`);
+         } else {
+             this.listeners.clear();
+             this._debugLog('removeAllListeners', 'å·²ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨');
+         }
+     }
+     
+     // ==================== å†…éƒ¨å·¥å…·æ–¹æ³• ====================
+     
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆç›‘å¬å™¨ID
+      * @returns {string}
+      * @private
+      */
+     _generateListenerId() {
+         return `listener_${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç”Ÿæˆäº‹ä»¶ID
+      * @returns {string}
+      * @private
+      */
+     _generateEventId() {
+         return `event_${Date.now()}_${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * è®°å½•äº‹ä»¶å†å²
+      * @param {Object} eventInfo - äº‹ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @private
+      */
+     _recordEvent(eventInfo) {
+         this.eventHistory.push(eventInfo);
+         
+         // é™åˆ¶å†å²è®°å½•å¤§å°
+         if (this.eventHistory.length > this.maxHistorySize) {
+             this.eventHistory.shift();
+         }
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * æ›´æ–°äº‹ä»¶ç»Ÿè®¡
+      * @param {string} eventName - äº‹ä»¶åç§°
+      * @private
+      */
+     _updateEventStats(eventName) {
+         const count = this.eventStats.get(eventName) || 0;
+         this.eventStats.set(eventName, count + 1);
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯
+      * @param {Error} error - é”™è¯¯å¯¹è±¡
+      * @param {Object} eventInfo - äº‹ä»¶ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @param {Object} listener - ç›‘å¬å™¨ä¿¡æ¯
+      * @private
+      */
+     _handleError(error, eventInfo, listener = null) {
+         const errorInfo = {
+             error,
+             eventInfo,
+             listener,
+             timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
+         };
+         
+         console.error('ğŸš¨ [EventBus] äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†é”™è¯¯:', errorInfo);
+         
+         // è°ƒç”¨é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨
+         this.errorHandlers.forEach(handler => {
+             try {
+                 handler(errorInfo);
+             } catch (handlerError) {
+                 console.error('ğŸš¨ [EventBus] é”™è¯¯å¤„ç†å™¨æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥:', handlerError);
+             }
+         });
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * è°ƒè¯•æ—¥å¿—
+      * @param {string} action - æ“ä½œç±»å‹
+      * @param {string} message - æ¶ˆæ¯
+      * @param {Object} data - æ•°æ®
+      * @private
+      */
+     _debugLog(action, message, data = null) {
+         if (this.debugMode) {
+             console.log(`ğŸšŒ [EventBus:${action}] ${message}`, data || '');
+         }
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * å¯ç”¨è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼
+      */
+     enableDebug() {
+         this.debugMode = true;
+         console.log('ğŸ› [EventBus] è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼å·²å¯ç”¨');
+     }
+     
+     /**
+      * ç¦ç”¨è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼
+      */
+     disableDebug() {
+         this.debugMode = false;
+         console.log('ğŸšŒ [EventBus] è°ƒè¯•æ¨¡å¼å·²ç¦ç”¨');
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ // åˆ›å»ºå…¨å±€å•ä¾‹å®ä¾‹
+ const eventBus = new UniversalEventBus();
+ 
+ // å¯¼å‡º
+ export default eventBus;
+ export { UniversalEventBus }; 
```

```diff
+ # æ—¥æœŸæ¸…ç†å‡½æ•°
+ function Clean-ByDate {
+     param(
+         [string]$dirPath,
+         [DateTime]$cutoffDate
+     )
+     
+     if (-not (Test-Path $dirPath)) {
+         return @{ Size = 0; Files = 0; Skipped = 0 }
+     }
+     
+     $cleaned = 0
+     $files = 0
+     $skipped = 0
+     
+     try {
+         Write-Host "    ğŸ” æ‰«æ: $dirPath" -ForegroundColor Gray
+         
+         # è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶å’Œç›®å½•

+         
+         foreach ($item in $items) {
+             $itemDate = $item.LastWriteTime
+             
+             if ($itemDate -le $cutoffDate) {
+                 try {
+                     $size = if ($item.PSIsContainer) { 
+                         # å¯¹äºç›®å½•ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å…¶å¤§å°ï¼ˆå¦‚æœä¸ºç©ºåˆ™åˆ é™¤ï¼‰

+                         }

+                         $item.Length 
+                     }

+                     Remove-Item $item.FullName -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+                     $cleaned += $size

+             }
+         }
+     } catch {
+         Write-Host "    âŒ æ‰«æå¤±è´¥: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
+     }
+     
+     return @{ Size = $cleaned; Files = $files; Skipped = $skipped }
+ }
+

+             }

+             Write-Host "  ğŸ“‚ è·³è¿‡: $dir (ä¸å­˜åœ¨)" -ForegroundColor Gray
+         }
+     }
+ }
```

çœ‹èµ·æ¥è„šæœ¬æœ‰ç¼–ç é—®é¢˜ã€‚è®©æˆ‘ä¿®å¤è¿™ä¸ªè„šæœ¬ï¼š

```diff
- 
+ # Cursor Date-Specific Cache Cleaner
+ # Clear all cache data up to and including the specified date
+ 
+ param(
+     [int]$Day = 20,
+     [int]$Month = 6,
+     [int]$Year = 2025
+ )
+ 
+ Write-Host "===== Cursor Date-Specific Cache Cleaner =====" -ForegroundColor Green
+ Write-Host "Cleaning data up to and including $Year-$Month-$Day" -ForegroundColor Cyan
+ 
+ # Build cutoff time (end of specified day)
+ try {
+     $cutoffDate = Get-Date -Year $Year -Month $Month -Day $Day -Hour 23 -Minute 59 -Second 59
+     Write-Host "Cutoff time: $($cutoffDate.ToString('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'))" -ForegroundColor Yellow
+ } catch {
+     Write-Host "Error: Invalid date format" -ForegroundColor Red
+     exit 1
+ }
+ 
+ # Check if Cursor is running
+ $cursorProcesses = Get-Process -Name "Cursor" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+ if ($cursorProcesses) {
+     Write-Host "Warning: Cursor is running" -ForegroundColor Red
+     $response = Read-Host "Force terminate Cursor and continue? (y/N)"
+     if ($response -eq "y" -or $response -eq "Y") {
+         Write-Host "Terminating Cursor..." -ForegroundColor Yellow
+         Stop-Process -Name "Cursor" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+         Start-Sleep -Seconds 2
+         Write-Host "Cursor terminated" -ForegroundColor Green
+     } else {
+         Write-Host "Cleanup cancelled" -ForegroundColor Red
+         exit
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ # Define cleanup paths
+ $basePaths = @(
+     "$env:APPDATA\Cursor",
+     "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Cursor",
+     "$env:LOCALAPPDATA\cursor-updater",
+     "$env:USERPROFILE\.cursor"
+ )
+ 
+ # All directories to clean
+ $allCleanDirs = @(
+     "CachedData",
+     "GPUCache", 
+     "ShaderCache",
+     "DawnCache",
+     "Code Cache",
+     "CachedExtensions",
+     "crashDumps",
+     "logs",
+     "User\logs",
+     "User\workspaceStorage",
+     "User\globalStorage", 
+     "User\History",
+     "extensions\logs"
+ )
+ 
+ $totalCleaned = 0
+ $totalFiles = 0
+ $skippedFiles = 0
+ 
+ # Date-based cleaning function
+ function Clean-ByDate {
+     param(
+         [string]$dirPath,
+         [DateTime]$cutoffDate
+     )
+     
+     if (-not (Test-Path $dirPath)) {
+         return @{ Size = 0; Files = 0; Skipped = 0 }
+     }
+     
+     $cleaned = 0
+     $files = 0
+     $skipped = 0
+     
+     try {
+         Write-Host "    Scanning: $dirPath" -ForegroundColor Gray
+         
+         # Get all files and directories
+         $items = Get-ChildItem $dirPath -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Sort-Object FullName -Descending
+         
+         foreach ($item in $items) {
+             $itemDate = $item.LastWriteTime
+             
+             if ($itemDate -le $cutoffDate) {
+                 try {
+                     $size = if ($item.PSIsContainer) { 
+                         $childItems = Get-ChildItem $item.FullName -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+                         if ($childItems.Count -eq 0) {
+                             0
+                         } else {
+                             ($childItems | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Sum
+                         }
+                     } else { 
+                         $item.Length 
+                     }
+                     
+                     Remove-Item $item.FullName -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+                     $cleaned += $size
+                     $files++
+                     
+                     $dateStr = $itemDate.ToString('MM-dd HH:mm')
+                     Write-Host "      Deleted: $($item.Name) ($dateStr)" -ForegroundColor Red
+                     
+                 } catch {
+                     $skipped++
+                     Write-Host "      Skipped: $($item.Name) (delete failed)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
+                 }
+             } else {
+                 $skipped++
+                 $dateStr = $itemDate.ToString('MM-dd HH:mm')
+                 Write-Host "      Kept: $($item.Name) ($dateStr)" -ForegroundColor Green
+             }
+         }
+     } catch {
+         Write-Host "    Scan failed: $($_.Exception.Message)" -ForegroundColor Red
+     }
+     
+     return @{ Size = $cleaned; Files = $files; Skipped = $skipped }
+ }
+ 
+ # Start cleaning
+ Write-Host "`nStarting date-specific cleanup..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
+ 
+ foreach ($basePath in $basePaths) {
+     if (-not (Test-Path $basePath)) {
+         Write-Host "Skipping non-existent path: $basePath" -ForegroundColor Gray
+         continue
+     }
+     
+     Write-Host "`nProcessing directory: $basePath" -ForegroundColor Cyan
+     
+     foreach ($dir in $allCleanDirs) {
+         $fullPath = Join-Path $basePath $dir
+         if (Test-Path $fullPath) {
+             Write-Host "  Cleaning: $dir" -ForegroundColor White
+             $result = Clean-ByDate -dirPath $fullPath -cutoffDate $cutoffDate
+             
+             $totalCleaned += $result.Size
+             $totalFiles += $result.Files
+             $skippedFiles += $result.Skipped
+             
+             if ($result.Files -gt 0) {
+                 $sizeStr = [math]::Round($result.Size / 1MB, 2)
+                 Write-Host "    Completed: $($result.Files) files/dirs, $sizeStr MB" -ForegroundColor Green
+             } else {
+                 Write-Host "    No cleanup needed (no matching files)" -ForegroundColor Gray
+             }
+         } else {
+             Write-Host "  Skipping: $dir (does not exist)" -ForegroundColor Gray
+         }
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ # Clean temp files
+ Write-Host "`nCleaning temp files..." -ForegroundColor Cyan
+ $tempFiles = Get-ChildItem $env:TEMP -Filter "*cursor*" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+ $tempCleaned = 0
+ $tempFiles_count = 0
+ 
+ foreach ($file in $tempFiles) {
+     if ($file.LastWriteTime -le $cutoffDate) {
+         try {
+             $size = if ($file.PSIsContainer) { 
+                 (Get-ChildItem $file.FullName -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum).Sum 
+             } else { 
+                 $file.Length 
+             }
+             Remove-Item $file.FullName -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+             $tempCleaned += $size
+             $tempFiles_count++
+             Write-Host "  Deleted: $($file.Name) ($($file.LastWriteTime.ToString('MM-dd HH:mm')))" -ForegroundColor Red
+         } catch {
+             Write-Host "  Skipped: $($file.Name) (delete failed)" -ForegroundColor Yellow
+         }
+     } else {
+         Write-Host "  Kept: $($file.Name) ($($file.LastWriteTime.ToString('MM-dd HH:mm')))" -ForegroundColor Green
+     }
+ }
+ 
+ $totalCleaned += $tempCleaned
+ $totalFiles += $tempFiles_count
+ 
+ # Display results
+ Write-Host "`n===== Cleanup Complete =====" -ForegroundColor Green
+ Write-Host "Date range: Up to $Year-$Month-$Day 23:59:59" -ForegroundColor White
+ Write-Host "Space freed: $([math]::Round($totalCleaned / 1MB, 2)) MB" -ForegroundColor Yellow
+ Write-Host "Files deleted: $totalFiles" -ForegroundColor Red
+ Write-Host "Files kept: $skippedFiles" -ForegroundColor Green
+ Write-Host "Recommend restarting Cursor for best performance" -ForegroundColor Cyan
+ 
+ # Ask to restart Cursor
+ $restart = Read-Host "`nStart Cursor now? (y/N)"
+ if ($restart -eq "y" -or $restart -eq "Y") {
+     Write-Host "Starting Cursor..." -ForegroundColor Green
+     Start-Process "Cursor" -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
+ }
+ 
+ Write-Host "`nCleanup complete! Cursor should run faster now." -ForegroundColor Green 
```
